item.g:title: 2 in 1 Musical Mobile
item.g:description: 2 in 1 musical crib mobile with motorized action and four adorable animal friends (three rainforest friends on the overhead mobile, plus a musical birdie!) comforts and entertains baby at naptime or bedtime with 20 minutes of soothing lullaby music. When baby outgrows a crib mobile, the musical birdie on the Rainforest Friends 2 in 1 Musical Mobile converts to a take-along toy with playful, baby-activated tunes, and a linkable stroller mobile. Clip it to your strollers canopy to take babys favorite Rainforest Friends on the go. Its use the musical birdie away from home, too, to give baby a familiar face and playful, new music to enjoy.ï¿½2 in 1 Musical crib mobile with motorized action and up to 20 minutes of lullaby music-Linkable stroller mobile for on-the-go-Take-along musical birdie toy knows when its on the go & automatically switches to baby-activated music mode with short, fun tunes.Adorable bird, elephant, tiger & lion friends comfort & entertain babyMotorized crib mobile spins to a stop while soothing music continues to play, reducing visual stimulation.Mobile easily attaches to almost any crib (not designed for use in playpens).Birdie toy has built-in carry handlegreat for toddler take-along, tooï¿½ THE hanging toys gently rotate to soothing lullabies. The base has a soft glowing night light to help soothe baby to sleep.ï¿½ -100% safe - 3 music modes classic, lullaby and nature - Soft glowing night light and music box - Includes a remote control - Infra-red remote control - Remote control with handle - Music box and night light can be used with or without mobile attachmentï¿½

item.g:title: Baby Feeding Bottle mimic natural breastfeeding ,Silicon Bebe Free Feeding Bottle
item.g:description: Silicon Feeding Bottle feature innovative and sensible design to most closely mimic natural breastfeeding. The naturally shaped, soft, silicone nipples are ideal for babies who have trouble transitioning from nursing to bottle-feeding.ï¿½ They are quite possibly the most thoughtful bottles currently out there. 150ml/5 oz and 250ml/8 oz bottles come with truly slow flow nipples (1 hole) designed for newborns up-to 3 months. 3-in-1 milk bebe free feeding bottle for pumping, storing & feeding . Made from silicone, a soft, flexible material thats free from chemicals. Designed from the best material to protectï¿½babysï¿½health ï¿½ Easy to grip, fill, andï¿½feedï¿½Design to latch: the end of the bottle war. Silicon Feeding Bottle are design with a wide mound and a naturally shaped nipple to help your little one make a seamless switch from breast to bottle.Soft & squeezy: skin-like touch & feel; bebe free uses a soft, skin-like silicone material ï¿½ï¿½ to offer a soothing, calming touch, and better grip.Easy to clean: a truly wide-neck design; bebe free bottles feature a super wide opening so that you can easily clean them by hand. Plus, they are very heat-resistant and safe in: Dishwashers (top-rack), Boiling water, Sterilizers, and Microwaves.Dual anti-colic vent: prevent colic & fuss; Silicon feeding bottle have two anti-colic vents that are smartly placed on the nipple to ensure that your babyï¿½ï¿½s bottle is perfectly ventilated. This means that your little one drinks milk and not air. Good airflow helps to prevent unwanted colic, spit up, burping, and gas. Plus, there are no extra pieces, so cleaning them is a cinch!

item.g:title: Baby Feeding Bottle with Handle Wide Neck Multi-function Drinking Water Cup
item.g:description: Anti-colic baby bottle - plastic.ï¿½ The silicone nipple is made from very soft silicone, which is soft and elastic in order to react to the babys sucking action and to imitate the natural feeling of feeding from a mothers breast. The shape of the nipple is design to prevent the accumulation of air in the babys tummy ant to help reduce colic or hiccups.Specifications of Anti-Colic Baby BottleProduct nameAnti-Colic Baby Feeding BottleHighlightsAnti-inflation feeding bottle with eccentric teatImitation nipple design simulates real feeding angleTo feed milk in a 45-degree sitting positionProtect your babys spine without looking upGrowth bottle to accompany your baby to grow up happilyComponentsDust cap, nipple, threaded cap, handle, PPSU bottle, storage lidCapacity240MLInstructionsAnti-inflation feeding bottle with eccentric teatImitation nipple design simulates real feeding angleTo feed milk in a 45-degree sitting positionProtect your babys spine without looking upGrowth bottle to accompany your baby to grow up happilyï¿½Anti-inflation feeding bottle with eccentric teatImitation nipple design simulates real feeding angleTo feed milk in a 45-degree sitting positionProtect your babys spine without looking upGrowth bottle to accompany your baby to grow up happilyï¿½Do not use a microwave to heat prepared milk or heat water for preparing milk.Please use the water that is boiled and cooled to 70ï¿½C.After adding appropriate amounts of water and milk powder to the bottle, screw the nipple ring fitted with the nipple onto the bottle and tighten it gently without covering the bottle cap, and shake the bottle from side to side until the milk powder is completely dissolved.Shaking the bottle up and down may cause the liquid in the bottle to spray out and result in burns.If the bottle is covered with the bottle cap and shaken, the pressure in the bottle will rise due to high temperature and may cause the liquid in the bottle to leak or spray out.After milk preparation, cover the bottle with the dust cap if the liquid is too hot and not suitable for the baby to drink, and cool the liquid in the bottle down to an appropriate temperature with flowing water or cold water.Use the flowing water to flush the body of the bottle instead of directly flushing the nipple and the dust cap.Before feeding, drip a few drops of liquid on the wrist to test and confirm the temperature.

flush the body of the bottle instead of directly flushing the nipple and the dust cap.Before feeding, drip a few drops of liquid on the wrist to test and confirm the temperature.

item.g:title: Bedroom Chest of Drawers Baby Drawer Storage Cabinet Plastic Storage Cabinet Childrens Wardrobe
item.g:description: Ourï¿½ Bedroom Chest of Drawers Baby Drawer is made of durable and high-quality plastic material which is non-toxic and rust-proof. This plastic storage drawers come with 6 storage spaces perfect fit for whatever needs filling, the ideal capacity to store all personal items, such as clothes, office supplies, art supplies, toys, bath items, seasonal holiday decorations, vegetables, fruits and more. The compact yet sturdy design ideally meets your requirements. It has a unique design that offers a variety of features so that organizing your clothes is no more a tedious job. This storage box is made from durable plastic to ensure long-lasting use. It has a smart and contemporary appeal that goes well with any room decor. You can store everything from towels or bath products to magazines, baby clothes, craft supplies, and many more. Tidy up your home and office with our gorgeous chest of drawers and make organization fun and clutter negligible. Our baby storage drawers can be assembled in a few minutes by hand. You can also disassemble the drawers and store them away when you dont need them. Organize your wardrobe, kitchen, bathroom, kids room, and bedroom, with our stackable drawers that help to sort through the chaos.Item No.LF053,LF054,LF055BrandYinsumSizeï¿½ LF053: 580*400*700 mm LF054: 580*400*920 mm LF055: 580*400*1140 mmWeight5kgMaterial100% food grade PPSelling Point1. Removable and easy cleaning 2.ï¿½Small crack and lightweight 3. High quality and eco-friendly PP Plastic

Reclining multi-position backrest with a convenient one-hand recline adjustment and extendable leg rest make it perfect for an infant to use. The fully adjustable canopy is design to protect your baby from harmful sun, and the large storage basket provides a convenient place for your essentials.ï¿½Age group : 0 to 4 years.Net weight: 10.6 kgFully adjustable backrest to sit or semi-lying or sleeping position for your baby.Adjustable handle to choose a comfortable height to push.Reversible stroller seat, so that your baby can face you or enjoy the world.Safer design with supernatural explosion-proof rubber wheels, pedal brake.Adjustable canopy for your kid to enjoy all weather conditions.The solid steel frame is easy to fold.

item.g:title: Big Circle Baby Floor Pillow for Kids Round Stuffed Plush Back Seat Cushion
item.g:description: This large round floor pillow by Mini Camp is the missing piece to complete your little oneï¿½ï¿½s playroom puzzle. They can play, read books and spend their precious moments on the pillow making beautiful memories. It isnt just incredibly functional ï¿½ï¿½ it also doubles as a wonderful decoration thanks to its patterned design and delicate fringing. This Must-have large floor lounger round pillow is Length: 90 CM, Thickness: 20 CM, made with 100% Cotton and is ultra soft, creates a perfect place for newborns to kick and coo in comfort and provide parents with a hands-free moment.ï¿½Makes The Perfect Gift: Instead of picking out yet another onesie they will outgrow in months. It gives good memories with a truly unique gift that will last for years on end and likely become one of baby and moms most cherished items.More Than Just a Pillow: serves as a floor pillow, play mat and security blanket that stays with a child as they grow. Available in multiple beautiful fabrics, this luxurious item is one that will always be on your mind.Portable And Easy To Carry: Perfect for moms on the go, your pillow is completely portable. It can be enjoyed anywhere, So much more practical to tote around as you move through the house or head out to visit others.Durable Kid-Friendly Fabrics: Hypoallergenic materials, breathable and non- toxic. We use 100-percent cotton fabric and breathable, hypoallergenic internal filler, which is safe for babys sensitive skin.Washable And Maintenance: The pillow can hand wash or machine wash cold, no bleach, and hang dry.

item.g:title: Breast Milk Pouch Feeding Bottle 240ML and 330ML
item.g:description: If you want the best way to soothe your colicky baby, the Breast Milk Pouch Feeding Bottle Anti-Colic is the best way to wean. The bottles come with features that make feeding convenient and easy. Natural Feeding is the first and only 100% non-toxic, medical grade silicone baby bottle on the China market which features simple but important design elements that naturally mimic breastfeeding as much as possible. Breastfeeding is a tactile experience for babies natural feel baby bottles replicate this feeling like no other bottle on the market.ï¿½ï¿½ They are soft and a little squeezy just like mumï¿½s breast. Breast Milk Feeding Bottle is also design with a super wide mound and natural shaped nipple for a better latch. Ideal for babies who are fed both breast milk and formula, or expressed breastmilk, or have trouble transitioning from breastfeeding to bottle-feeding. The feeding bottle was design with smart vents, which eliminate leaks and help prevent colic. Thanks to this brilliant baby bottles innovative wide neck, it is clean quickly and easily without a brush.ï¿½Silicone is the perfect material for baby bottles as it is one of the safest available. It is free of all nasty chemicals such BPA, PVC or Phthalates. ï¿½ï¿½Silicone is extremely heat resistant so feeding bottles are microwave, dishwasher and sterilizer safe and they can also be boiled in water. ï¿½ Unlike conventional plastic baby bottles, Natural feeding silicone baby bottle is naturally anti-microbial and hygienic. They are also shatter proof, making them highly durable.

item.g:title: Car Seat Stroller 3 in 1 Suitable for 0-1 year
item.g:description: Make a safe addition to your little ones travel essentials by installing this car seat in your car. It features easy to grip handles labels and belts that add to the safety and convenience of this car seat. Made by using quality material, the seat will last longer._ _ Our Infant Car Seat is a perfect combination with 3 in 1 Pram Stroller. This Baby seat is compatible with our Baby Life High landscape 3 in 1 . The Ergonomically designed Baby Carrier Seat is flexible and portable keeping Infants safe and gives them a feeling of comfort. The seat has a cushioned breathable back support along with the foot cover. A wide canopy to keep the child safe from sun. It is very easy to clean and soft on baby skin. Due to its light weight, its very easy to install in the car using the seat belt. Perfect gift for Baby shower and New Born! Carry your newborn in this safe, comfortable seat and your baby will love it!_Group 0+, fit for baby 0-13 kg, 0-15 month;Three point safety protection;Two shoulder strap levels;European imported buckle, ITW from Spain;Large available space for baby;3-level handle adjustment (Balance position, Cradle position, Installation position);Strong compatible ability, fit with many famous car seat adaptors: Maxi-cosi cabrio fix, Cybex Aton, Goodbaby Pocket, Nuna Pipa, BEBE Comfort Pebble."ï¿½

Cotton Cartoon Baby Knee Pads Anti Slip Crawling Protector
item.g:description: This Crawling knee pad protector with thickened terry lining and anti-slip dotted rubber can protect your babys knees from scrapes and scratches when they start learning to crawl and walk. A pair of knee pads in bright colors: pink, blue,. The antiskid pad is designed with a smiling face, lovely and cute. This is a great gift for babies and friends. You no longer need to worry about your baby being injured while crawling or walking. Cotton Cartoon Baby Knee Pad Anti Slip Crawling Protector. The protector covers kneecap and the leg are available in three different colours. Features:ï¿½Made from durable, high elastic and comfortable material.Very breathable, absorb sweat, deodorization durable and soft to wear, make your baby move around freely.Stretchy design for easily slipped on and off.Flexible, comfortable and lovely color.Protect baby from bumps and bruises when they learn to walk.Wear as elbow pads when toddles learn to ride bike, scooter, roller skate, skateboard.Perfect gift for your friends who have baby.Package included: 1 pair * Baby Kneecap Note: 1. Please allow 1-3mm error due to manual measurement. 2. The colors may have differences as the different display, please understand. Product type: Knee Pad Protector Specification: Material: Cotton + Spandex

item.g:title: Transparent folding kids playpen travel cot baby sleeping bed
item.g:description: Multipurpose Baby Bedside Cot is a complete package for a new mum, no wonder you can call it a magic combo! This cot is a co-sleeper with can be attached to the mommys bed, has two layers for Sleep and Play, it has detachable Rocker to make your little one comfortable, a Diaper Changing Unit, Diaper Storage Unit and a Musical Rotating Toy Bar for the perfect sensory development. This cot also comes with a 360ï¿½ mosquito net perfect for the baby to sleep without any mosquitoes and insects. This Multipurpose Baby Bedside Cot has 4 in 1 qualities of a Bassinet, where your new born can sleep comfortably, on the other hand this 2nd Floor can be remove to have a spacious playard for many hours of fun for your infant or toddler. The Zipper enclosed entrance is another fun way for the baby to get in and out. The Changing Station with Organizer makes the Mums Life easy! Keep the required things handy in the organizer and change the Nappies or make the new born change dress Safely, thanks to the elevated borders and extra space (Never leave a child unattended).Multifunctional baby travel bed BabyThe 4 Toys are musical, rotating and bright in colors are perfect for your little one to grab and play helping him or her to develop eye hand co-ordination and motor skills. Its perfect when you have to go outdoors or visiting grand parents, carry this extra comfortable foldable cot and enjoy every moment of your holiday. It comes along a zipper bag which is carry around easily. When at home and not in use, it can fold easily. The Multipurpose Baby Bedside Cot and playard also has wheels which makes it extremely easy to move from one place to another. The Lovely Color and Design will accentuate your Babys nursery and practically a must have for every New Parent!

item.g:title: Double Wearable Breast Pump
item.g:description: Breastfeeding just got more convenient and comfortable with the latest innovation in breast pumps: the wearable and hands-free breast pump!ï¿½1.This electric breast pump is equipped with a 1200mAh rechargeable lithium battery,which can be used 3-5 times when it is fully charged.2. breast pump adopts a silent motor, there is no noise when breast milk iscollected, and it does not disturb the babys sleep.3.The product has a memory function, and automatically enters the mode and gear setlast time after restarting.4.The product can be disassembled as a whole, which is very easy to clean and protectthe health of you and your baby.-This electric, lightweight pump fits inside your bra and allows you to pump milk from two breasts simultaneously, with a high-frequency mode that gently stimulates milk lactation at the beginning of the suction process.ï¿½With three modes and 16 levels of suction, you can adjust it to your comfort level through the touch screen and digital display. The wearable design frees your hands for other tasks and the memory function makes it more efficient. Its made from Eco-friendly and skin-friendly materials, with low noise level and built-in battery.ï¿½This pump is the worlds first silent breast pump, allowing you to switch sides for single or double pumping. Its perfect for busy moms who want convenience and comfort while breastfeeding.?Hands-free Design?The innovative hands-free electric breast pump can free mothers hands to perform other activities while collecting breast milk. It can be worn in clothes to get enough privacy. So whether you are a working mother or household mother, it is lighter and more portable for you. Good choice for every mother! ï¿½?Soft and Painless?Our S4DW electric double breast pump is made of high-quality silicone material, which is skin-friendly and soft, and fits breasts naturally. It does not harm mothers body while collecting. ï¿½?Multi-function, Easy Operation?2 modes of massage and sucking+16 gears to adjust. Our S4DW breast pump simulates real breast pumping action of a baby. Easily adjust through the LED screen to turn on intelligent massage mode. ï¿½?Anti-backflow Design, No Waste? The wearable breastfeeding pump uses a closed system, which keeps milk completely separate from the pump pieces and ensures better hygiene and performance. Avoid milk outflow and protect the purity of milk. ï¿½?Moms Favorite, Thoughtful Gift?This breast pump is quiet while working, so it does not wake your baby. Choose a product that suits you or your wife to help free hands and enjoy life. ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½

item.g:title: Electric Breast Pumps Portable Smart Hands-Free with 2 Modes 9 Levels -180 ml
item.g:description: Wearable Electric Breast Pumps Hands-Free Breast Pump Wireless Breastfeeding Pump Silent Breast Milk Extractor for Travel and HomeComfortable Breast Pump: Imitating the principle of baby sucking, it has 2 modes and 9 adjustable levels to stimulate and increase milk secretion, ensuring that every mother can find her own rhythm to secrete milk comfortably and effectively.No Leak & Excellent Sealing: Combining the anti-backflow valve and ergonomic design, with a tightly sealed structure to obtain better suction, more effectively prevent breast milk leakage. 21/24mm Flangesï¿½Suitable for most nipple sizes.No Pain & Portable Breast Pump: Food-grade BPA-free silicone, skin-friendly. The soft silicone breast horn shield naturally fits most mothersï¿½ breast shapes, reducing the motherï¿½s discomfort during pumping. Comes with a USB cable for easy charging.Wearable & Hands-Free Breast Pump: Using an electronic breast pump can help maintain mothersï¿½ milk supply. The wearable design frees motherï¿½s hands, allowing mothers to work or rest during breastfeeding. With milk bags to save breast milk.Ultra-Quiet & Cleanable: Innovative air extraction technology, the sound is less than 40 dB when used, and will not disturb a sleeping baby. 1000 mAh battery for longer time use. Silicone parts can be sterilized in boiling water or steam.Portable Electric Breast Pump-Free your handsWearable breast pump allows mothers to secrete breast milk in a relaxing environment. It is an electric breast pump that fits directly into your bra, allowing you to pump discreetly on the go.Material: ABS (Main engine); BPA free silicone and PP (Tee: silicone horn, suction bowl, duckbill valve)Battery Capacity: 1000 mAh Lithium batteryCharging Time: about 2.5 hoursUse Time: about 80 minutesLarge Capacity: 180mlUSB: Type C

Anti Colic Feeding Bottle Newborn Anti Colic Bottles
item.g:description: Anti-colic feeding bottle with our patented base provides vacuum-free feeding preventing bubbles ensuring babies dont get air in their tummy. The ROOTS NATURAL ï¿½ï¿½Wide Neck Premium Quality bottle is BPA & BPS Free, andï¿½Voc in Silicone Nipple For Baby Health and thanks for the Anti-Colic Air System which minimizes infant colic caused by harmful swallowing of air. The anti-colic vent system is designed to grow with baby, and we recommend using this system to experience all the health benefits of our bottle. This bottle helps to make bottle feeding more natural for your baby and you. Anti-colic feeding bottle with patented anti-colic base provides vacuum-free feeding and prevents bubbles ensuring babies do not get air in their tummy while feeding. Benefits: Extra soft teat Easy latch-on Anti colic base Easy to fill and clean How to use: For Anti Colic Feeding Bottle. Make sure to follow the instruction on milk preparation. Make sure to check the temperature of the milk first before giving it to your baby. When giving the bottle always keep your babys head higher than his torso. The part of the teat that is in the childs mouth must always completely filled with milk. It minimizes the risk of swallowing air.

This portable warmer set gives you perfectly warmed milk, water, or formula every single time. It works so well it can replace the cumbersome bottle warmer sitting on your kitchen counter. Bullet Points:ï¿½USB Charging: The bottle warmer comes with a USB cable. Just connect the cable to any power bank, such as a car USB or a laptop port. Help you heat milk anytime, anywhere.Good Insulation: This milk heater bag can keep food and drinks warm for a long time. It can also avoid hot water cups burning hands, which is also convenient to clean.Durable and Safe: The movable baby bottle warmer bag is made of durable materials, which is odorless and friendly to your baby. item.g:title: Baby Carrier 360 All-Position for Newborn to Toddler with Lumbar Support (7-45 Pounds)
item.g:description: With a baby carrier from aimama, you can hold your baby close while at the same time keeping your hands free for other things! We have baby carriers for all your different needs ï¿½ï¿½ from simple models better suited for newborns to more aimama baby carriers with a waist belt so you can carry for a long time. All baby carriers from aimama are made from toxin-free, child-friendly materials and are soft against your childï¿½ï¿½s skinThe carrier best for back carry.If youre looking for everyday comfort, youve found the solution with our aimama Original baby carrier, which is where it all began. This soft, cotton baby carrier will give you and your baby great pleasure both as a follow-up to a newborn carrier and as a newcomer to carrying. Our Original is suitable for carrying babies from around four months (5.5 ï¿½ï¿½ 25 kg) and thanks to the aimama Infant Insert, which is available separately, it is use from birth (3.2 kg). Other practical additions are our Drool Pads to protect your baby carrier from your babys new teeth and the rain or winter protector to help you cope with everyday life in all weather conditions. Multiple carrying positions The original baby carrier allows you to choose between three comfortable, ergonomic carrying positions: - Front Carry ï¿½ï¿½ facing parent - Hip Carry (from approx. 8 months) - Back Carry (from approx. 8 months) Ergonomic comfort Our Original makes baby wearing not only a wonderful, but above all a comfortable and convenient experience. It is equipped with flexible, comfortably padded shoulder straps and a wide, supporting hip belt with lumbar support. Of course, this carrier also supports your kids in its natural and ergonomic M-position and the hood keeps babys head down when dreaming in a relaxed manner or protects against too much sun. Well thought-out features As a bonus on our classic as well, the hood serves as a privacy screen when breastfeeding or as sun protection for your baby and a spacious zip pocket offers space for e.g. a changeable body or a spare nappy, wipes and gives your hands even more freedom. No matter whether you carry your baby at home or on the road, our attention to detail and high-quality workmanship mean that you can use this cuddly baby carrier for several children over several years. With our original baby carrier, we know that both you and your baby will be happy.

item.g:description: The Swing Cot extendable Bedside bassinet in has been design with the added bonus of a second mesh window and a breathable mattress made from a spacer fabric, design to disperse heat and moisture away from your little one helping them stay cool and comfortable whilst resting. The bassinet also features a roll down curtain made from a double-layered brushed twill fabric to reduce airflow during colder nights, giving you the option of a one or two-sided opening. This handy feature makes the crib suitable for all seasons and climates.Specifications of Swing Cot Bassinet:ï¿½Helps to create and strengthen that special bond between you and your little oneAllows you to breastfeed more easilyGives you peace of mind that your baby is closed byYour baby can stay safe in your own bedroom for their first 6 months (as recommended by experts)When using in rocking mode, the flip-out feet allow you to secure the crib and stop rocking when required2 x Breathable Mesh Windows - Breathable mesh windows give full visibility of your baby and allow air and moisture to pass through the crib easilyRoll down curtain ? item.g:title: Baby Crib, Baby Wooden Cot, Bed Multifunctional Rocker, Convertible Desk and Kids Sofa with Mosquito Net (bedding set and mattress sold separately)
item.g:description: ï¿½Baby life Teddy Multi functional baby crib cot has teething rail on both side so that babies can chew without hurting her soft gums. This also prevents baby from swallowing small wooden flecks once few of babys tiny sharp pearls show up. The baby crib can also be used as playpen for your naughty ninja while you can relax worry free.ï¿½It has a smooth silk finish and natural color with touch of golden color (scratch resistant, mirror polish) which matches with almost all the existing furniture in your room. No headache of resale when baby grows up, it makes a perfect desk for many years ahead, preserving all your precious memories with your little prince/princess. It can be transform into childrens stylish sofa for those little friends she will bring to her room.ï¿½The bassinet bed can extend with 1.5 feet when baby grows up. Its is scientifically design to makes baby feel like its in moms arms and dozes off to sleep hassle free. Forget using age old method of putting baby to sleep on lap which almost takes all of new moms energy. Baby-Teddy crib bed lets you to keep diapers, cloths, toys, grooming kit and so on. Organize and handy in the huge storage provided below the crib.ï¿½Baby Teddy Multi functional baby crib cot is from solid wood, has smooth silk finish and golden scratch resistant mirror polish. It comes with baby friendly White split mosquito net. Baby Teddy 10 in 1 Multi functional crib pass the all SGS certification parameters including the raw material use, manufacturing process and the final product. It is produce from solid New Zealand pine wood with excellent quality of craftsmanship which is carefully design making it mom friendly, safe for baby and brings a stylish look to your baby nursery.

item.g:title: Baby Eating Sitting High Chair For Feeding
item.g:description: This trendy 2-in-1 high baby eating chair is 2 table heights adjustable: a standard dining table of 75 cm and a childrens table of 50 cm. A set of extra-long legs is optionally available to adjust the height of the high chair to a kitchen island of 90 cm. Thanks to the easy assembly, changing height is very easy. The childs seat is also use from birth in combination with the booster Seat. The depth-adjustable eating tray is optionally available, so your child has his / her own table. The high baby eating chair has a 5-point safety belt and a detachable safety bumper to ensure your childs safety. One-of-a-kind swiveling feature allows for easy feeding and interaction with your little one. Dishwasher-safe, removable tray and tray insert for quick, effortless cleaning. A high chair makes it easier for small children to sit at the same table as adults, which helps them develop social and eating skills. Easy to disassemble and carry along. The raised edges prevent spills from landing on the floor. We know that childrens skin is extra sensitive, but not to worry. This product has been tested, approved and is completely free from substances that may harm your childs skin or health. This product is intended for children able to sit up unaided and up to 3 years or a maximum weight of 15 kgï¿½Gender:ï¿½ UnisexAge Range:ï¿½ 0-6mAge Range:ï¿½ 7-12mMaterial:ï¿½ PlasticOrigin:ï¿½ CN(Origin)Model Number:ï¿½ Highchairs ï¿½Pattern Type:ï¿½ PrintBaby Eating Chair:ï¿½ Baby Highchair For FeedingBaby high chair:ï¿½ baby eating chairChildrens dining table:ï¿½ Portable eating table seatType:ï¿½ HighchairsBaby chair:ï¿½ Children Folding Dining Chairchair for kids:ï¿½ multi-function folding baby chair

The childs seat is also use from birth in combination with the booster Seat. The depth-adjustable eating tray is optionally available, so your child has his / her own table. The high baby eating chair has a 5-point safety belt and a detachable safety bumper to ensure your childs safety. One-of-a-kind swiveling feature allows for easy feeding and interaction with your little one. Dishwasher-safe, removable tray and tray insert for quick, effortless cleaning. A high chair makes it easier for small children to sit at the same table as adults, which helps them develop social and eating skills. Easy to disassemble and carry along. The raised edges prevent spills from landing on the floor. We know that childrens skin is extra sensitive, but not to worry. This product has been tested, approved and is completely free from substances that may harm your childs skin or health. item.g:title: 3 in 1 Baby Born Pram Stroller Bicystar - with bassinet and car seat
item.g:description: The Baby Jogger babylife 3 in 1 pram stroller is a superior version of the original urban, ultra-compact City Tour, released in February 2018. The full-suspension chassis provides a smoother ride, but the smaller wheels make the City Tour Lux more suitable for city walks. The handy brake is situated on the side of the handlebar. This high view 3 in 1 pram stroller comes with wide bassinet, multi-seating position, adjustable canopy & handlebar. Its easy to install. The 3 in 1 pram stroller from Baby Jogger is a great choice for a complete travel system, with a reversible from-birth seat unit for rear or forward travel and an infant car seat or folding carrycot (both sold separately), with a range of other practical features:ï¿½Ultra-compact one hand fold and auto-lock when folded, allowing you to fold and go quicklyIncludes a carry bag and integrated carry strap a for easy transportFlip flop friendly hand brakeLightweight and durable PU tyresAll-wheel suspension to help keep parent and baby comfortable on many terrainsThe seat unit has multiple recline positions including lie flat and features an adjustable calf supportThe three panel hood with pop out visor offers extra shade and contains UV 50+ protection and a peekaboo windowï¿½

item.g:description: The kids walker is ready for adventure and fun anytime! Your child will love learning to walk and explore when they are strapped into the ultra-comfortable and super-sleek security harness, which is made of polyester foam and covered with polyester batting for added support and durability.ï¿½ ï¿½Baby Links 3 in 1 Formula 1 Race Car Walker is the perfect teacher and entertainer for your little one that is beginning to become mobile. The kids walker is light weight and easy to assemble.ï¿½ ï¿½It does not take much space to store and can even fit in your car boot when travelling. The padded seat ensures baby is comfortable while light, music and sounds keep baby entertained. ï¿½ï¿½The walker performs 2 functions. It can be used as a normal walker or push walker. The height of the walker can be adjusted to suit your babys needs.ï¿½ ï¿½Shock absorber bumpers keep your furniture and walls protected while rubber wheels ensure quiet movement. Stoppers maintain baby safety at steps and edges.ï¿½ ï¿½Suitable from 9 months. Set includes 1x Baby walkerï¿½ï¿½

item.g:title: 3 in 1 baby stroller High landscape two way baby stroller
item.g:description: High landscape 3 in 1 baby stroller two way baby stroller, a 3-in-1 functioning stroller, a carrycot, and a car seat, baby strollerbaby stroller Features:Modern and functional solution: pram and stroller in oneBaby pram may be used from birth, including the function of stroller and child safety seat3-position adjustable system ï¿½ from upright sitting to laying positionMay be installed both as a rear-facing or front-facing seatAccessories: bag, raincover, footcover, mosquito net and adapters of Maxi Cosi typeDurable and stable designPumped wheelsLarge shopping basketFront swivel wheels (self-aligning) with locking optionBrake with simultaneous, double clamp on the rear wheels5-point safety harness with soft padsHandle height adjustable in 5 positionsHandles finished with eco-leatherDurable and stable designOption kob af viagra i tyskland kulhydratindtag til kob of extending the canopy with one move: additional unzipped partDouble protection against accidental foldingCHILD SAFETY SEAT:Design for children weighing from 0 to 20 kg (ECE group 0+)3-point safety belts3-position adjustable handleAdjustable shoulder strapsDescription baby stroller 3 in 1 high landscape:Featuring a 3-in-1 functioning stroller, a carrycot, and a car seat, the High landscape stroller has all of the benefits. Your child will benefit from this model for many years, from the time it is born until it weighs 22 kilograms! Stifftung Warentest, an independent institute based in Germany, rated the baby lifeï¿½s pushchair positively. Additionally, among its features it is equipped with an enlarged, spacious hood, as well as a synthetic leather handle that has a number of adjustable possibilities. It is extremely manoeuvrable, making it ideal for city walks. It features air-filled wheels that are robust and rotating 360 degrees, as well as a steering lock so you can ride in a straight line.Comfort:The Travel System allows you to easily and quickly mount the seat in the frame. You donï¿½t have to wake up the baby to get the baby out of the car!Simple change of the carrycot into a stroller within just a few seconds.The hood is enlarge with a zip.The seat has as many as 3 adjustment positions (adjustable with one hand) ï¿½ sitting, reclining and lying.The stroller can be mounted in two ways: in forward- and rearward facing position.The front air-filled wheels rotate 360 degrees and have a lock for riding in a straight line.For greater comfort for the parent, the handle has a wide adjustment range.

item.g:title: Luxury Baby Stroller 3 in 1 Fashion Carriage Gold Frame Pram
item.g:description: Luxury Egg Shape StrollerMulti-purpose Luxury Baby Stroller has a modern and elegant appearance with an egg shape and matte finish that is specially built for parents who want to keep in style. It is especially perfect for moms who always love to go on shopping with their babies.Why Do You Need This Multi-Functional Egg Shape Stroller?It has three amazing functions. For newborn babies up to six months, you can detach and set the bassinet flat to become a sleeping basket. The sleeping basket may be used as a car seat. The seat is reversible and rotates at 360 degrees. Just press the button below the seat to rotate. Place the basket wherever you want either on the table or on the floor and youï¿½ll have no problems. Soothe the baby while the stroller is facing on you. A bottle rack is on the side so you can place any water container or bottle. Bring your little kidï¿½s things and keep it under the storage compartment of the stroller. This eliminates the need for you to bring a separate bag for his items. The wheels are shock absorbing and are extremely smooth even on uneven surfaces.Product featuresMaterial: frame aluminum alloy, awning leather, wheels PU wear-resistant tiresFunction: 360-degree rotation. You can implemented the stroller in both directions. Luxury stroller with a high view.Applicable age: The sleeping basket is suitable for babies between 0-6 months old. The stroller is suitable for babies from 6 to 36 months old. The baby carrier is suitable for babies 0-1 years oldThe maximum load-bearing capacity is 25KGThe stroller has a visible sunroof, parents can observe the babyï¿½s dynamics at any time.The height of the sleeping basket from the ground is 60cm.Enlarge the storage basket to save more space for parents.Sleeping basket size: 32.6*158.2inch.Folding size: 31.5*24*12.2inchBaby stroller net weight 12.1KGThe front wheel is approximately 7.4 inches, and the rear wheel is approximately 11.8 inches. Can easily cope with various road surfaces.3C:Certificate number

item.g:description: Multi-functional 3 in 1 Baby Stroller High landscape Can Sit Reclining Light Folding Two-way Eggshell shape Design Baby Stroller.This Egg Shell Stroller stylish 2-in-1 White Baby Luxury is perfect for long walks and shopping sprees. The egg-shaped bassinet is comfortable for baby up to the age of 36 months, and it comes with a carrycot for babies up to 6 months. Whether sitting or lying down, your babyï¿½s comfort is safe.It is reversible, allowing you to see the baby, and allowing the baby to lead the way once she is grown enough. It is unisex, so whether you have a gentle baby or a young lady, you will be the envy of all.Itï¿½s about time! The eggshell shape baby stroller is finally here to make walking around in the world even sweeter for you and your little one. This patented invention is perfect for parents on the go, transporting a baby whether it be across the neighbourhood or town.And if tired legs are an issue, this innovative product allows both of you to get some shut-eye while strapped safely inside with mesh screens opening for air circulation. So give your walk life more meaning with Eggshell shape stroller by Babylife today!

item.g:title: Medical Mattress, Single Medicated Mattress, W70 x L130
item.g:description: Would you like a good-quality and breathable baby mattress for your child? The 130 x 70 cm size BABY childrenï¿½s mattress is the right one. It is a double-sided buckwheat/foam/coconut mattress, which, thanks to its composition, is not only breathable but also flexible.Each layer is made of natural and good-quality materials that guarantee its safe and comfortable use.The top layerï¿½consists of buckwheat hulls, known for its health benefits. They are placed in chambers that are customised to perfectly adjust to a childï¿½s body shape. This buckwheat layer prevents spine deformities, has antistress and antiseptic effects, softly massages the childï¿½s body, which results in better overall blood circulation. Thanks to the fact that buckwheat does not heat up from the sleeping childï¿½s body (toddler), it minimises sweating, preventing the occurrence of skin problems and bedsores. Other than that, buckwheat is also antibacterial, which keeps away mites.The middle layerï¿½is comfortable foam.The bottom layer of the mattress is also made of a natural material, namely pressed coconut fibre. These fibres are mainly known for their elasticity and moisture resistance. They are hollow inside and resistant to bacteria and fungus. Coconut fibre is characterise by perfect thermal properties, ensuring the appropriate air circulation inside the bottom layer of the mattress. It absorbs sweat and moisture.It comes with aï¿½hypoallergenic cover, which is removable and machine washable. All components used for the production of the childrenï¿½s mattress comply with strict hygienic standards for the production of products for children.Weight limit 30 kg.Height: 10 cm.Dimension of mattress:130ï¿½70 cmMattress type:Antibacterial mattress, Foam mattressWeight limit:30 kgHeight mattress:10 cmMattress Firmness:3 ï¿½ medium

item.g:title: Ingenuity Power Adapt Portable Swing, Bingham Bunny
item.g:description: This baby swing is a necessary tool for fussy babies and also for mothers. Carrying your baby in your arm the whole day is not an easy job, this easy foldable swing, with comfortable foam, can be an excellent tool for you. Our Baby Swing is usually portable so that you can carry them anywhere you want. Life does not live in one place. When you go on a trip, you can take a tour with you. The compact hammock is easy to transport with the same features you would expect from a full sized hammock.Baby can happily relax during the spontaneous movement, listen to the soothing natural sounds and melodies and have fun with the plush friends tied in the bow tie. The hammock is designed to fit anywhere. You can also enjoy the dual benefits of technology and battery power. You can use the AC adapter near an electrical outlet or switch the swing to battery mode.The anti-slip legs and 5-point harness ensure the safety of the child and maximum comfort is provided by the ultra-soft seat.Pivoting toy bar with 2 plush toys and 3 total slots for attaching more toysPowered by HybridriveTechnology batteries last up to 3 times longerPlush seat pad and removable head rest are easy to clean8 melodies and 3 nature sounds with volume controlConverts from swing to vibrating seat with Easy Lock Slim Fold design folds flat for easy storage or travel 5 swing speeds plus soothing vibrationsMaximum Weight: 10Kgs.Recommended Age: 0-9 mos.

The compact yet sturdy design ideally meets your requirements. It has a unique design that offers a variety of features so that organizing your clothes is no more a tedious job. This storage box is made from durable plastic to ensure long-lasting use. It has a smart and contemporary appeal that goes well with any room decor. You can store everything from towels or bath products to magazines, baby clothes, craft supplies, and many more. Tidy up your home and office with our gorgeous chest of drawers and make organization fun and clutter negligible. Our baby storage drawers can be assembled in a few minutes by hand. You can also disassemble the drawers and store them away when you dont need them. Organize your wardrobe, kitchen, bathroom, kids room, and bedroom, with our stackable drawers that help to sort through the chaos.Item No.LF053,LF054,LF055BrandYinsumSizeï¿½ LF053: 580*400*700 mm LF054: 580*400*920 mm LF055: 580*400*1140 mmWeight5kgMaterial100% food grade PPSelling Point1. item.g:title: High quality baby floor play mat foldable portable animal printed playmat stylish soft crawling baby mat (180*200 cm)
item.g:description: Introducing the 200*180 CM Play Mat, the ideal plaything for your child. With a thickness of 1 cm, this extra-thick play mat offers the ideal amount of padding for your childs activity. This play mat is made of high-density XPE foam, which is not only tasteless and environmentally benign but also lightweight and conducive to safe and fun play.The play mat has a double-sided design that keeps your child interested and is waterproof and non-slip. The foam material is pliable enough to shield your baby while they are crawling and is wipeable.In addition to giving your infant a pleasant play space, this play mat is also easily stored away when not in use thanks to its practical foldability and inclusion of a carrying case. This extra-large play mat can be utilized in a variety of locations, including playrooms, nurseries, vacations, picnics, and more.With the 200*180 CM Play Mat, you can say goodbye to dirty floors and jumbled blankets and give your kid the best playing ever.

With this item, you can take advantage of the ease of pumping milk while on the go and storing it conveniently for later use.This breastpump is ideal for breastfeeding mothers because it was created with your comfort and convenience in mind. item.g:title: The Ultimate Hands-Free Breastfeeding Solution: Portable and Customizable Wearable Breast Pump
item.g:description: A dependable and comfortable breast pump is one of the most crucial things a new mother can do for both herself and her child. For moms who are busy and want to make breastfeeding as convenient and uncomplicated as possible, our wearable breast pump is the ideal option.Our breast pump has four modesï¿½Massage, Expression, Auto, and Lactationï¿½as well as 12 levels of adjustment, making it both portable and adaptable. Because you can do this, you can tailor your pumping experience to fit your particular requirements, ensuring that youre comfortable and getting the most milk flow possible.The 900mAh battery in our breast pump is one of its main components. As a result, you have continuous electricity to pump whenever and wherever you need to. Additionally, it is portable with a net weight of only 220g. Our breast pump makes breastfeeding simple whether youre at work, on the go, or just need some alone time.Additionally, the pump features a convenient 2.5-hour charging period, allowing you to have it ready to use whenever you need it. It also includes a 20-minute auto shut-off feature for additional safety. With this function, your pump will automatically turn off after 20 minutes of use, preventing overheating and extending the life of the device.Our wearable breast pump is not only a useful breastfeeding tool, but also a lovely and covert way to give your baby the healthiest nutrition possible. Its ideal for working mothers who wish to make nursing as convenient and simple as possible. You may be certain that you are giving your kid the greatest nourishment possible while also taking care of yourself if you use our wearable breast pump.Therefore, if youre seeking a dependable and cozy breast pump that will make breastfeeding as convenient and easy as possible.

item.g:title: Comfortable and Fun: The Cartoon Foldable Kids Sofa - A Perfect Seating Solution for Your Little Ones
item.g:description: The ideal seating option for your small ones is here: the Cartoon Foldable Kids Sofa! This plush cat-shaped childrens couch is more than just an ordinary armchair; it also functions as a bed for kids to unwind, play, or sleep. This folding sofa, which is shaped like a grey cat, is a charming addition to any playroom and provides your kids with excellent support thanks to the pocket on the back and the extra-wide armrests.With dimensions of 50x40x52cm when folded and 120cmx50x38cm when unfolded, this 2-in-1 flip open kids sofa bed provides comfort and adaptability. Since it doesnt have a sturdy frame and is lightweight, its simple for your kids to transport and play with it wherever. The sofa is even self-folding and self-unfolding, giving it the ideal size couch for kids, boys, and girls.The high-elastic sponge used for the foldable sofas cushions provides a sturdy and comfortable sitting experience. The sofa cover is soft crystal velvet, and the backrest is constructed of soft polyester fiber, both of which are breathable and kind to the skin. It is a lovely present for kids to get for their birthdays, Christmas, and Halloween, and it will stay with them throughout a wonderful life.Please be aware that the sofa arrives compacted and can need a few days to fully regain its flawless appearance. It is advised to wash the sofa cover in warm water while disassembling and cleaning it to avoid wrinkling. Both hand and machine cleaning are options.

item.g:title: Adjustable Baby Bassinet for Newborns and Nursing Mothers with Anti-Reflux Tilt and Cradle Mode
item.g:description: For parents who want to give their infant a cozy and secure sleeping environment, our stand-alone baby crib is ideal. ï¿½It can be used as a portable bassinet in the living room, bedroom, or wherever else. ï¿½Babies who have reflux when lying down are guaranteed a restful nights sleep with the anti-reflux tilt configuration. ï¿½In the cradle mode, you can use one hand to gently shake the bassinet to hasten your babys sleep. ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½You can easily modify the height to fit your bed thanks to the scientific adjustment levels in the adaptable design. ï¿½Move the crib about with ease and safety without damaging the floor thanks to the built-in wheels with brakes. ï¿½You may keep baby necessities close at hand in the small but roomy compartment located beneath the bedside sleeper bassinet, saving you the time and effort of running to the babys room whenever your child needs a diaper change. ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½Our infant bassinet is made with your babys comfort and your convenience in mind. ï¿½Everything your infant requires for a restful nights sleep is provided by the soft foam mattress, mosquito net, and storage basket. ï¿½Additionally, it is simple to fold up and stow, making it easier to transport. ï¿½It can be used as a baby cot or toddler bed from birth up to 24 months of age and measures L93 x W55 x H83cm. ï¿½To provide your child with the greatest sleeping environment, invest in our luxury baby crib, auto-swing bed rocker with height adjustment, and next-to-bed configuration. ï¿½

Comfortable and Fun: The Cartoon Foldable Kids Sofa - A Perfect Seating Solution for Your Little Ones
item.g:description: The ideal seating option for your small ones is here: the Cartoon Foldable Kids Sofa! This plush cat-shaped childrens couch is more than just an ordinary armchair; it also functions as a bed for kids to unwind, play, or sleep. This folding sofa, which is shaped like a grey cat, is a charming addition to any playroom and provides your kids with excellent support thanks to the pocket on the back and the extra-wide armrests.With dimensions of 50x40x52cm when folded and 120cmx50x38cm when unfolded, this 2-in-1 flip open kids sofa bed provides comfort and adaptability. Since it doesnt have a sturdy frame and is lightweight, its simple for your kids to transport and play with it wherever. The sofa is even self-folding and self-unfolding, giving it the ideal size couch for kids, boys, and girls.The high-elastic sponge used for the foldable sofas cushions provides a sturdy and comfortable sitting experience. The sofa cover is soft crystal velvet, and the backrest is constructed of soft polyester fiber, both of which are breathable and kind to the skin. It is a lovely present for kids to get for their birthdays, Christmas, and Halloween, and it will stay with them throughout a wonderful life.Please be aware that the sofa arrives compacted and can need a few days to fully regain its flawless appearance. It is advised to wash the sofa cover in warm water while disassembling and cleaning it to avoid wrinkling. Both hand and machine cleaning are options.

Intelligent Baby products formula maker, one step automatic Baby milk formula maker/baby formula machine
item.g:description: A hassle-free option for parents to make their babys formula milk is now available thanks to the Smart Formula Mixer. This cutting-edge device is outfitted with cutting-edge features including programmable formula concentration, temperature, and water volume, making it compatible with almost all formula brands and bottle sizes. You are able to choose the ideal formula mixture for your child thanks to customisable choices.The Living mobile app on your smartphone can be used to control it in addition to manual control via the machines panel. You may program your formula preferences and control the machine remotely with the app. Also, the app has a live chat feature that enables you to quickly address any problems.Your babys formula milk is safe and healthy thanks to the Smart Formula Mixers FCC approval and lack of BPA. The machines broader design allows you to regulate the temperature and water volume between 98ï¿½F and 158ï¿½F (37-70ï¿½C) and 1ï¿½F increments. The water volume adjustment ranges from 1 to 9 ounces (30-270 ml). When you need to meet the unique needs of your newborn, this feature is extremely helpful.Last but not least, this amazing formula mixer works with dual-band mixed 2.4GHz and 5GHz Wi-Fi signals. It does not, however, support 5GHz Wi-Fi transmissions.In conclusion, for busy parents who want to be sure that their babys formula milk is produced properly, consistently, and safely, the Smart Formula Mixer is a great purchase. The Smart Formula Mixer offers a creative and practical alternative for feeding your child thanks to its user-friendly features and app remote control.

item.g:title: baby life Newborn-friendly Baby Bedside Sleeper with Wheels and Adjustable Height Levels (toys are not included).
item.g:description: Bringing a new baby home can be both a thrilling and stressful event. Choosing a place for your child to sleep is one of your most crucial choices. For parents who wish to keep their infant close by while guaranteeing their comfort and safety, the babylife Baby Bedside Sleeper is a great choice.With its built-in wheels, this bassinet is simple to transport from one room to another. This makes room sharing simple and allows you to keep your infant close by day or night. Also, you can modify the bassinet to properly match your bed thanks to its nine adjustable height settings.Also, the babylife Baby Bedside Sleeper includes a machine-washable sheet, which is invaluable when dealing with spit-up and blowouts from diapers. It is a more delightful experience for both parent and child because of the music box and toys that are supplied.Its quick and simple to assemble, so you can use it straight away. Its portable design also makes it ideal for usage while on the go, making it a need for parents who frequently travel.Finally, the babylife Baby Bedside Sleeper is a chic and secure choice for infants. item.g:title: 2 Piece Nature Feel Baby Feeding Bottle Set Wide Neck Design, Up To 6 Months 5 Oz
item.g:description: HighlightsNon-leaking dual air-vents prevent colicHygienic silicone promotes a safe and comfortable feeding experienceOrthodontic structure mimics a natural sucking actionSoft and squeezy bottle offers a soothing, calming touch and better gripWide-neck design offers ease in cleaningOverview ï¿½The world continues to change right before our eyes. But why is it that baby bottles are the same old unflattering tools? After all, isnt the baby bottle one of the first objects that your baby experiences through all five senses? Why should mothers have to worry about toxic plastic and colic-inducing design for something so basic and important? We found no good reason and decided to challenge the status quo. In our voyage, weve learned an important lesson. Inspiring products are born only when we think with a mothers heart and experience through a babys eyes. We proudly introduce babylife natural-feel baby bottle. babylife baby bottles feature innovative and sensible design to most closely mimic natural breastfeeding. Our naturally shaped, soft, silicone nipples are ideal for babies who have trouble transitioning from nursing to bottle-feeding. Your little one will love to hold onto the skin-like, soft and squeezable body that is like no other bottle in the world. And you will fall in love with our wide-neck design for brushless, stress-free, cleaning bliss! Our bottles are equipped with truly innovative vents that are smartly designed to prevent colic, while completely eliminating annoying leaks. They are quite possibly the most thoughtful bottles ever made. Easy feedings, happy baby: - naturally shaped, squeezable, soft, skin-like silicone ï¿½ ideal for breast-fed babies - innovative and non-leaking anti-colic vents - unique interlocking feature and no-drip design easy to clean: - wide-neck design for easy, brushless cleaning - safe in: microwave, boiling water, dishwashers and sterilizers safe feeding: - 100 percent safe materials: BPA, PVC, phthalate free.Teat Type : Slow Flow (0-3 Months) ï¿½

item.g:title: Twin Bassinets for Baby Double Bedside Sleeper - Perfect for Twins, Adjustable Height and Angle, Mesh Sides, Storage Pockets, Available in two colors
item.g:description: Parents of newborn twins who wish to keep their children near and secure at night can consider the Twin Bassinets for Baby Double Bedside Sleeper. This sleeper has a number of features to guarantee the security and comfort of both newborns.The Twin Bassinets for Baby Double Bedside Sleepers adjustable height and angle is one of its most notable features. This makes it possible to attach the sleeper to a large bed, sofa, or chair so that parents may easily care for their infants. It is simpler to feed and comfort babies because the two sides of the sleeper may be adjusted to different heights. Also, the tilt angle successfully avoids reflux and spitting up.The sleepers mesh sides maximize airflow and visibility so that parents may watch over their infants as they sleep. Also, this keeps newborns cozy and cool. Both babies enjoy a clean, cozy sleeping surface thanks to the sleepers thick mattress and simply machine-washable, removable sheets.The sleepers narrow base has lockable wheels that make it simple to move around the space or conceal under a bed or sofa during the day. Burp cloths, tiny toys, or pacifiers can be conveniently stored in the integrated storage pockets.The Twin Bassinets for Baby Double Bedside Sleeper is appropriate for infants from 0 to 24 months old and is offered in gray and khaki. It is made to give both babies a secure and comfortable place to sleep, providing new parents peace of mind. This sleeper is the ideal option for parents of twins because to its variety of features.

item.g:title: Dearest 718 Baby Stroller The Foldable and Portable All-Season Solution for Comfortable and Convenient Travel
item.g:description: The Dearest 718 Baby Stroller is the ideal option for parents who are constantly on the move. Parents looking for a robust and adaptable stroller should choose this one because of its foldable and portable design, which enables year-round use.Baby strollers like the Dearest 718 are made to be as comfortable and convenient as possible for parents and babies. It is approved for use with youngsters 0 to 4 years old and has a CE certification. It can sustain a load of up to 25 kg.The basket is made of cationic waterproof fabric, and the frame is built of aluminum alloy, both of which are premium materials. Additionally, it has PU damping wheels for a comfortable ride on any surface. The stroller weighs 8.5 kg when packaged, and 7.5 kg when empty. The stroller also has a one-key adjustable folding mechanism that makes it simple to use and transport.The stroller is excellent, maneuverable, has been waiting for this for a long time, according to one customer review. Rolls up into a convenient suitcase with a handle, so you dont have to lift heavy objects. I cover my legs in black and take off the star. New canopy design that is light, simple to use, simple to wear, cabin-size, 360-degree rotation Mesh that is breathable and has an adjustable tilt angle for simple year-round weather adaption. 8-inch twin rear wheels with double brakes on one leg are safe and practical. Maintain the babys spines tiny size and large area with firm board support so the childs feet and hands can move around freely.The brand-new canopy design of the Dearest 718 Baby Stroller now has an adjustable tilt angle, making it simple to adjust to seasonal weather fluctuations. The air can move freely through the breathable mesh, keeping your child cool and comfortable in heated weather. For extra convenience and safety, the stroller also has a double rear wheel with an 8-inch diameter and a double brake on one leg.The solid board support that protects the babys spine and guarantees your childs comfort and safety is another fantastic feature of the Dearest 718 Baby Stroller. Additionally, the stroller is made to provide your childs hands and feet plenty of room to move around, resulting in optimal comfort.In conclusion, The Dearest 718 Baby Stroller is a folding, transportable, and adaptable stroller that is made to be as comfortable as possible for your child and as convenient as possible for you. This stroller is the ideal option for parents who are constantly on the go thanks to its premium materials, adjustable and one-key folding mechanism, and brand-new canopy design. ï¿½

item.g:title: Multifunctional Baby Carrier
item.g:description: Looking for a versatile and comfortable baby carrier that can keep up with your active lifestyle? Look no further than the multi-task 6-in-1 Baby Carrier Backpack.Crafted from soft and breathable 100% cotton, this carrier is perfect for use in any season. With a detachable waist stool, harness, and backboard, it offers six different carrying options, so you can choose the best fit for you and your little one. Plus, the hands-free design makes it easy to take care of your baby while youre on the go.In addition to its functional design, the multi-task baby carrier also features several enhanced security features, including a protective backboard to shield your babys head and neck from the wind and sun, a reflective strip for increased nighttime visibility, and an upgraded safety buckle for added peace of mind.Whether youre a mom, dad, grandparent, or babysitter, the multi-task baby carrier can be adjusted to fit all caregivers. And with three storage pockets for your essentials and baby gear, its the perfect choice for parents who want to stay organized and prepared.Invest in a high-quality baby carrier that can keep up with your busy lifestyle.

item.g:title: Dearest Multifunction two-way Travel System Baby Stroller
item.g:description: A multifunction two-way travel system baby stroller is designed to provide convenience and versatility for parents on the go. This type of stroller is equipped with multiple functions and features to accommodate the needs of both the parents and the baby.One of the key features of a multifunction two-way travel system baby stroller is its ability to be used in various ways. It typically comes with a seat that can be easily adjusted to face either forward or backward. This allows parents to have the option of keeping an eye on their baby while pushing the stroller, or letting the baby explore and interact with the surroundings. This flexibility makes it suitable for different age groups and developmental stages of the baby.Another important feature is its compatibility with a car seat. A multifunction two-way travel system stroller often comes with a detachable seat that can be easily transformed into a car seat. This eliminates the need for an additional car seat, as the stroller can be used as a travel system in a car, providing convenience for parents who frequently travel.In addition, these strollers are equipped with various storage options to accommodate the needs of parents. They typically come with a spacious storage basket underneath the seat, providing ample space for storing essentials such as diapers, wipes, and toys. Some models may also have additional storage compartments, cup holders, or pockets for personal belongings such as keys, phones, or wallets.Brand name: DEAREST ï¿½ ï¿½Suitable Age: 6 months - 3 years ï¿½ ï¿½Load Bearing: 15kg, 20KG ï¿½ ï¿½Usage : Baby Travel ï¿½ ï¿½Foldable ï¿½ ï¿½ï¿½
